testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.quote: This program transformed my approach to business and gave me the confidence to launch my startup. The mentorship and resources provided were invaluable.

testimonial2.name: Michael Chen
testimonial2.quote: The mentorship I received was invaluable. My mentor helped me navigate challenges I never expected and provided insights that shaped my business strategy.

testimonial3.name: Emma Rodriguez
testimonial3.quote: The community and networking opportunities through this program opened doors I never thought possible. The connections I made were just as valuable as the mentorship.

testimonial4.name: David Kim
testimonial4.quote: The practical workshops and hands-on learning experiences were exactly what I needed to take my business to the next level. Highly recommended!

event1.title: Session 1: Introduction to Business Case & Strategic Thinking
event1.description: Learn about Business Case Competitions structure, MECE Framework, and hypothesis-driven approach. Analyze real cases to identify core issues.

event2.title: Session 2: Market & Competitive Analysis
event2.description: Master Porter's Five Forces, PESTLE Analysis, TAM/SAM/SOM, and SWOT analysis. Apply these frameworks to real market cases.

event3.title: Session 3: Business Strategy & Financials
event3.description: Explore growth strategies, Business Model Canvas, and financial forecasting including break-even analysis, ROI, and NPV.

event4.title: Session 4: Marketing & Go-to-Market Strategy
event4.description: Dive into 4Ps Marketing Mix, STP, digital marketing strategies, and develop comprehensive Go-to-Market plans.

event5.title: Session 5: Pitching & Storytelling
event5.description: Learn effective pitch structure, public speaking techniques, and Q&A handling. Practice group pitching with detailed feedback.

event6.title: Session 6: Mock Business Case Competition (Preliminary)
event6.description: Team-based business case challenge. Develop strategy, analyze market, prepare financials, and pitch to judging panel.

event7.title: Session 7: Final Pitch Preparation & Revisions
event7.description: Refine strategies based on feedback, optimize pitches, and practice handling tough questions from judges.

event8.title: Session 8: Business Case Simulation (Final Competition)
event8.description: Full-scale mock competition with complete pitches, rebuttals, scoring, and detailed evaluations from instructors.

project1.title: Eco-Friendly Packaging Solution

project4.title: Urban Tech Solutions
project4.description: An innovative platform that uses IoT and AI to optimize city resources and improve urban living conditions.
